name: Eighty/20 Results - Member Cancellation Policy for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Adds a membership level setting to configure how PMPro will handle membership cancellations.
sections.changelog:
This change log contains information about the updates/modifications/fixes created for this add-on.

1.8

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Updated copyright notice and now tested up to v5.1

1.7

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add CSS file containing style to hide Cancel link if member cancelled membership already
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Remove 'member cancelled this level' meta when membership is expired by Cron
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Conditionally load custom CSS to hide 'Cancel' link on Accounts page
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Track membership level being cancelled for the user (used by conditional CSS load)

1.6

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Use cache for membership end date & user ID map
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Refactor licensing domain initiation
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Added membership_ends() function for user ID -> enddate
  4. BUG FIX: Prevent fatal error during plugin upgrades
  5. BUG FIX: Didn't calculate end date (for messages & display) correctly

1.5

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Upgraded Utilities class (1.6)
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Added is_in_trial() method which includes support for Subscription Delays add-on & native trial periods
  3. BUG FIX: Could excessively nest when sanitizing array values

1.4

  1. BUG FIX: Would not always load the correct membership record
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Avoid double-loading class on init
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Added filters to allow replacement of 'subscription' (singular) and 'subscriptions' (plural) strings (e20r-member-cancellation-subscription-label-singular and e20r-member-cancellation-subscription-label-plural filters)
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Allow singleton pattern for class (not required)
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Allow caching of Membership Level definition per user ID
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Renamed main class for plugin (WordPress Code style compliance & autoloader simplicity)
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Temporarily remove ability to configure deletion of inactive member accounts
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Use properly sanitized REQUEST variables
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Use autoloader for plugin
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Added debug statements to help isolate potential issues
  11. ENHANCEMENT: Add caching and utilities classes
  12. ENHANCEMENT: Add namespace for plugin
  13. ENHANCEMENT: Refactor namespace
  14. ENHANCEMENT: Use licensing logic in plugin
  15. ENHANCEMENT: Added placeholder for option to delete inactive (expired members) users from system
  16. ENHANCEMENT: Use plugin slug constant for translations
  17. ENHANCEMENT: Initial work to support trial periods and setting the enddate for the membership if cancelled to the last day of the trial.
  18. ENHANCEMENT: Add autoloader function
  19. ENHANCEMENT: Add new class directory to build script

1.3

  1. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Change the Account 'Expiration' header to 'Ends' if the policy is 'end of period' and the user's membership has an enddate

1.2

  1. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Only load policy engine if user is logged in
  2. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Load the pmpro action hooks if the policy is set to end of period for that user's level
  3. BUG/FIX: Would incorrectly exit for recurring memberships

1.1

  1. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Handle class instantiation

1.0

  1. BUG/FIX: Incorrect build process for change logs
  2. BUG/FIX: Build environment tweaks
  3. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Add license header & fix css elements for add-on
  4. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Add styling for the level settings page
  5. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Use correct setting name for termination policy choice
  6. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Set the default value for the current level while saving
  7. Initial Commit
